summary: expands the werewolves and werebears of skyrim and solstheim
descriptionHtml:
*****Requires all DLC *****

If you use this mod you should have alternate start live another life and its new addon New beggnnings for ALAL plus the Enhanced Factions:The Companions for best gameplay of new werewolf characters 

Now compatible with mods that alter the werewolf Scripts 



Adds- 
-Skyrim- 
-a clan of werewolves hidden in the mountains north of Riften 
-new weapons and armor 
-new quests 
-Werewolves Spawn at locations as wolves starting at level 10 and can level with you 

-Solstheim- 
-Expands on the Frostmoon Werewolf Pack 
-adds a Hdden village to FrostmoonCrag 
-Adds 3 New Npc Members of the Frostmoon Pack 
-adds a Short WIP Questline 
-adds a Encounter that starts the questline (Might add a Prerequisite to the Encounter) 

_____________________________________ 
Next to do-- 
_____________________________________ 
-Werebear Lunar Based Transformations 
-More Quests 
-More Werewolf & Werebear Encounters 
-WereBeast Hunters 

_________Werelions of Elsweyr__________ 
-Add a WereLion Clan 
-Moonpaths Questline For Werelions with Custom Transformation 
-New Zones and Dungeons with Encounters 
-New Items 

__________Werecrocs of Argonia___________ 
-Questline for WereCrocs with Custom Tranformation 
-New Zones and Dungeons 
-Bigger Areas to Explore 
-New NPC's 


___________Raid on the Hunting Grounds___________ 
-add the Daedric Plane of Hircine by using the Kors hunting grounds mod
-add More Quests 
-Add a Shrine of Hircine 
-add an offering System to Aquire Unique items 
-Add an Audience with Hircine in His Realm 
-Aquire the artifact you didnt get from his daedric Quest 
-Expand His Daedric Quest
author: Elfendrago

files.name: WereWolf Expansion WIP
files.changelogHtml:
Fixed bug thatmight have been causing infinite loading screens
added Custom Transformation for werecrocs and a new land in black marsh
added werewolf Hunting Spells and weapons also changes the weapons of the werewolf hunter that starts the questine
